title: Your refuge by the Sea.
text1: Lions Houses is not just a house, it’s your territory. Located in the beautiful coast of Parrita, we offer you a sanctuary far from the concrete jungle.
text2: Here, luxury is measured in hours of sleep and wealth in grains of sand. Perfect for families looking for a peaceful den or couples ready to hibernate under the sun.
host: Meet the Host (Yes, he’s a dog)
modal_services_text: Total privacy, and such a relaxing environment that you'll forget stress existed.
modal_host_text: Our host is a expert in naps and professional in greeting guests with style.
modal_guide_text: Beaches, great food, tours, and local secrets to help you survive Parrita like a champion.
